experience.organizationDesc: Silicon Valley VC funded seed-stage EdTech start-up
aboutWork: Leading dev team of 6 building platform for class taking, streaming, marketing; setting strategy and driving product development

Building 100+ REST API and web app of 3k+ DAU (keo.plus) with Angular and Node.js for fast iteration and coherent coding practices; storing data in MongoDB for flexibility and scalability; streamlining testing with Google Cloud Run

Deploying with Alibaba Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes; managing servers, domains, infrastructure, file storage, content distribution, load balance, SMS/Email with Alibaba Cloud, AWS; establishing product management protocols and managing Agile practices with Git, Jira
Conducting full stack development of important features such as phone user authentication, offline quiz, third party account linkage

experience.position: Digital Product Management and Data Intern
aboutWork: Led engineering of a drug name Optical Character Recognition-Named Entity Recognition AI API in collaboration with Tencent AI Lab

Helped manage a health WeChat miniprogram (170k users): optimized business intelligence time performance by 99.8% with Python and Selenium, worked cross-functionally to facilitate design and delivery of complex, multi-disciplinary features, assisted senior strategy

experience.organizationDesc: Global top 3 for intelligent robot vacuum
aboutWork: Built an automated CI/CD pipeline that processes 700k images weekly for customer-facing computer vision object detection AI models

Developed and integrated image preprocessing, object detection, inference verification website, self-designed relational database with Bash, Python, SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Docker, Git; significantly accelerated and streamlined CNN model training and testing
Participated in paper reading and implementation of YOLO, SSD, MobileNet, Monodepth, Neural Architecture Search, FreeAnchor, etc.

Investigating deep learning based shape-from-silhouette 3D reconstruction to solve traditional concavity, occlusion challenges (PyTorch); building encoder-decoder for segmentation and occupancy modeling; leveraging geometry for self-supervision; advisor: Prof. Srinath Sridhar

research.organization: Brown Perception, Action, and Cognitio Lab
aboutWork: Examining graph NNs (transformer, interaction net) for reinforcement learning and multimodal application; advisor: Prof. Chen Sun

research.organization: Brown Applied Math Directed Reading Program
aboutWork: Analyzed and implemented Physics-Informed Neural Networks (deep NNs that encode physical laws) with TensorFlow and matplotlib to solve problems involving differential equations (inference relative error <0.3%); worked with Enrui Zhang under Prof. George Karniadakis

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

Math.awardDetail: 2020 Mathematical Contest in Modeling Meritorious Winner (top 8%)
Brown Mathematical Contest in Modeling 1st Place
